name: Razer Huntsman V3 Pro
description: Flagship gaming keyboard with 2nd-gen Razer Analog Optical Switches. Features adjustable actuation, Snap Tap for instant counter-strafing, and 8000Hz polling rate.

reviews.review_text: Snap Tap is legal cheats. Movement is so responsive.
8000Hz polling is placebo but keyboard is solid.
Great for gaming but prefer tactile for typing.
